it.apice.sapere.node.agents.impl
Class DefaultAccessPolicy

java.lang.Object
  it.apice.sapere.node.agents.AbstractAccessPolicy
      it.apice.sapere.node.agents.impl.DefaultAccessPolicy
All Implemented Interfaces:
LSAspace, OntologyHandler, LSAspaceAccessPolicy
public class DefaultAccessPolicy
extends AbstractAccessPolicy

This class provides a default LSA-space access policy.

Author:
Paolo Contessi

checkInjectPermissions

public final void checkInjectPermissions(CompiledLSA lsa,
                                         SAPEREAgent requestor)
                                  throws SAPEREException
Description copied from class: AbstractAccessPolicy

Checks if the requestor has the right to execute the INJECT operation.

In order to deny the permission a SAPEREException must be thrown.
